content.description: Stand start 4 feet right of the crack. Use a right hand sloping sidepull and your choice of small left hand features to stand up on large right footholds. Continue up small crimps and thumb-presses to a unique sloper horn on the left. A scoop crimp to the right will get you to a jug, then topout. It may be a good idea to brush the lip of the boulder off incase there is debris.
content.location: This line starts 4 feet right of the crack in the middle of the central face of The High Court. Dark blue line on the topo.

content.description: Stand start on a jug shelf. Move up until you are standing on the shelf and and use a triangular crimp with your right hand to move to the lip of the boulder. Figure out a foot sequence on small slab holds that allow you to mantle over the lip. Make sure the top of the boulder is clean before going for the flash. Try not to psyche yourself out and step of the detached block to the right.
content.protection: A pad, but the landing is sloped. Try not to pad surf.
content.location: This line goes mostly straight up the left side of the central face of the High Court area. Pink line on the topo.

content.description: Stand start on crimps below the small ledge and climb up to jugs over the ledge. Continue straight up to a tree at the lip of the boulder. If you are a purest, try to topout without touching the tree, else grab that tree and pull yourself over the lip. If you are a naturalist, just downclimb.
content.location: This line starts four feet right of the left side of the central face of the High Court area. Yellow line on the topo.

content.description: Stand start on a sharp large sidepull. Smear up to a broken undercling and reach to a flat jug. Muscle up over the jug and desperately reach for the lip past the jug. Climb up and over the secondary boulder (carefully) to topout, then downclimb off to the right.
content.location: This line climbs up the green part of the right wall of the High Court. (Yellow line on the topo)

content.description: Sit start the detached wedge block line with a right hand incut crimp and a left hand on a broken edge. Try not to dab on the ground or the other rock and yank up to a jug. Pull up over the lip of the boulder and walk off.
content.location: Wedged between the central and right walls of the High Court. Yellow line on topo.

content.description: Stand start on large holds (a right odd flat bump jug thing) and climb straight up through crimps to a jug rail. Stand up on the jug rail and topout at the lip.
content.location: This is the line six feet left of the right side on the left face of the High Court Area. Pink line on the topo.

content.description: Stand start with a great foot jug and crimps in the seam. Follow iron holds straight up to the lip of the boulder and topout. Tall slab goodness.
content.location: This line goes straight up the right side of the left face of the High Court area. Cyan line on the topo.

content.description: Stand start with a ledge foot-jug and razor crimps. Bump up to a sharp two finger pocket and a sloping edge. Continue up through a large incut gaston and alarge sloping edge. Topout over the potentially dirty lip.
content.location: This is the right most line on the central face of the High Court area. Cyan on the topo.

content.description: If you like dirty slab cracks, you'll love this one! Stand start with a perfect hand jam and climb up through tip jams, a foot jam, and a finger lock. Mantle the jug and mantle the lip to topout.
content.location: This follows the crack up the center of the central face in the High Court area. Green-ish on the topo.

content.description: Stand start the same as Stolnik, but once you reach the odd sloping horn, transition left with a cute pinch to the crack and finish up Groom of the Stool.
content.location: This line starts 4 feet right of the crack in the middle of the central face of The High Court and transitions into the crack at mid height. Purple line on the topo.

content.description: Stand start smearing on the low sloping rail. Edge up through crimps and a long move to the lip of the main boulder. Use pinch jugs to pull over the second boulder to topout.
content.location: This line goes up the center of the right face of The High Court area. (Green line on the topo)

content.description: Establish with a low right edge foothold and whatever your hands can pull on. Move up and slightly right to the juggy cubical flake. Follow the flake up to the lip and topout over the second boulder.
content.location: This line is the left most line on the right face of the High Court area. (Blue line on the topo)
